content:
I am having issues where the IG publisher does not display the text for an extension but does show in the generated JSON file.

Here is the generated JSON for the example, which does not show on the HTML narrative content.
"extension" : [
{
"url" : "http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/event-location",
"valueReference" : {
"reference" : "Location/cms-organization-location-01"
}
}
],
